hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.unideb.kgsoft.scrabble.Field

  • public class Field
extends Object
    The Field class represents a field of the game board. Field objects contain the specific properties a field of the game board can have.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Field.Multiplier
      The possible point multipliers a field can give.
      static class  Field.Status
      The possible statuses of a field in a turn.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int jokerTileCode
      The code of the tile which is replaced by a joker.
      private Field.Multiplier multiplier
      The multiplier of the field.
      static int NOTILE
      Constant, which is the tileCode of Field objects with no tile on them.
      private Field.Status status
      The status of this field in a turn.
      private int tileCode
      The code of the tile on this field.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Field()
      Constructs a new Field object, and initializes it with no tile and no multiplier.
      Field(Field.Status status, Field.Multiplier multiplier, int tileCode, int jokerTileCode)

      • getJokerTileCode

        public int getJokerTileCode()
        Returns the code of the tile which is replaced by a joker. Its value is always NOTILE, unless a joker tile was placed on the field.
        Returns:
        the code of the tile replaced by a joker

      • setJokerTileCode

        public void setJokerTileCode(int jokerTileCode)
        Sets the code of the tile which is replaced by a joker. It should be called when a joker tile is placed on the field, or picked up.
        Parameters:
        jokerTileCode - the tile code to set
